Key Match Events: India beat England by 68 runs in the T20 World Cup 2024 Semi-final
Axar Patel won the player of the match award for his 4-0-23-3 performance
India scored 171/7 after batting first and later bundled out England for 103
Pre-Game Insights: India and England are in a T20 World Cup semi-final
The weather had cleared up and England opted to bowl
There was no reserve day for the game
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed satisfaction with the team's performance
Jos Buttler acknowledged that India outplayed England
Axar Patel mentioned that the wicket was slow and he bowled slower to make it difficult for the batters
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the second time India and England were meeting in a T20 World Cup semi-final
The game was played in Guyana
